description: {"blocks":[{"key":"39nmm","text":"This protocol can be used in this form or with small adjustments regarding concentration and reaction time to determine in vitro substrate phosphorylation for any purified kinase substrate pair.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2am9t","text":"It can be used to determine inhibition curves by addition of concentration series of kinase inhibitors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae1ob","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4etf0","text":"Reaction is carried out in 50 µL reaction mix containing final concentration of 50 nM kinase and 5 µM substrate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"d1m88","text":"Purified proteins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fiv1g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amk8p","text":"kinase: LRRK2RCKW ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":13,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18ki4","text":"protein sequence: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pbr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28d4o","text":"substrate: Rab8A ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v5uj","text":"protein sequence: GHMDYLFKLLLIGDSGVGKTCVLFRFSEDAFNSTFISTIGIDFKIRTIELDGKRIKLQIWDTAGQERFRTITTAYYRGAMGIMLVYDITNEKSFDNIRNWIRNIEEHASADVEKMILGNKCDVNDKRQVSKERGEKLALDYGIKFMETSAKANINVENAFFTLARDIKAKMDKK\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8019r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nkdk","text":"Buffers and Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqf5k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r6in","text":"reaction buffer: 20 mM Hepes pH 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 0.5 mM TCEP,  20 µM GDP, 2.5 mM MgCl2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":99,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9sss","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq7tg","text":"ATP 100 mM stock in dH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":22,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a65oe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25u7g","text":"mass spec buffer: dH2O + 0.1% formic acid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":20,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6n9ur","text":"Incubate reaction for 3 h at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eork2","text":"Note: depeding on kinase this may be shorter or longer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hm4b","text":"Prepare 50 µL reaction mix I: 50 nM purified LRRK2RCKW and 5 µM Rab8 substrate in buffer containing 20 mM Hepes pH 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 0.5 mM TCEP, 20 µM GDP, 2.5 mM MgCl2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":50,"length":4},{"style":"sub","offset":181,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jjet","text":"Aliquot 25 µL per tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uk9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5cpg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbabu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aj6ng","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dtqm8","text":"If you want to run multiple reactions prepare a master mix and aliquot 25 µL per tube.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6gt7","text":"Prepare 25 µL reaction mix III: same as reaction mix II but no ATP as negative control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ug4u","text":"Start reaction by adding 25 µL reaction II to reaction mix I.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6att7","text":"Note: for negative control add 25 µL reaction mix III to second aliquot of reaction mix I.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"21uoi","text":"Mix by vortexing and brief centrifugation for 30 sec with 500xg.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9c1a","text":"Prepare 25 µL reaction mix II: 2 mM ATP + 2.5 mM MgCl2 in buffer containing 20 mM Hepes pH 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, 5% glycerol, 0.5 mM TCEP, 20 µM GDP, 2.5 mM MgCl2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":53,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":157,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edimr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3haj5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cg38e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a9qsm","text":"Multiply if you want to run more than one reaction.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbi8i","text":"Stopp reaction by adding 50 µL mass spec buffer (dH2O+0.1% formic acid).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":51,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8jmhj","text":"Store at -80°C or proceed directly with mass spectrometry analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71tih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8clbh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7p872","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31l4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r8mo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9glih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tv74","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fg2n0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d454d","text":"For determination of inhibition curves, prepare a concentration series of inhibitor in DMSO. Prepare a master mix of kinase and substrate pair and aliquot 25 µL per tube. Add the
desired amount of inhibitor to each of the tube and incubate all reactions at room temperature.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bp07d","text":"For analysis: substrate phosphorylation/turnover can be determined
as ratio between phosphorylated and unphosphorylated peak intensity for each
sample analyzed.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5579v","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
